BasicInfo.short: Skylock.cc produces and retails electronic key-less bicycle security locks.

Products.name: Velo-1
Products.description: Velo-1 was added to CrunchBase in 2012

Products.name: Skylock
Products.description: Skylock is a connected device bicycle lock and smartphone application that changes the way people interact with their bicycle.
